name: NCAA Football 09
overview: Forget beefy cover athletes in mid-run with pigskin clutched tightly in hand; it's time for the mascots to rule. For the Wii version of "NCAA Football 09," a cartoony Spartan (Michigan State's Sparty) graces the cover with finger triumphantly pointed upward. Will I get to play as mascots? Either way,this particular sports cover stands out among the rest.
